name: EDU-E-PRO
short_description:
Edu-e-progress is a School Management software.In edu-e-Pro user can manage there schools,students,teachers,employies.etc..i want to develop this application like plugin model..user can install modules or remove module from control panel of the software..and aslo any developers can create plugins for this aplication

following are the main module of the edu-e pro

1.       Enquiry
2.       Admission
3.       Attendance
4.       Course
5.       Fees
6.       Time Table
7.       Human Resource
8.       Examination
9.       News
10.   Users
11.   Settings
12.   Hostel
13.   Library
14.   Transport
15.   Calendar
16.   Events & Function
17.   Inventory
18.   Placement
19.   Poll
20.   Task
21.   Accounting
22.   Online Assignment
23.   Model Question paper
24.   Lesson plan preparation
25.   Photo Gallery
26.   Online tutor
27.   Online leave application
28.   Clinic facility management
29.   Certificate generation
30.   Discipline
etc..
summary: Complete Management Software suit for Schools and colleges
